content: Kaspar Rufibach has received training as a mathematical statistician. Through more than 15 years in various biostatistical roles he has complemented his thorough theoretical background with expertise in biostatistics. He is passionate about applying this expertise to solve problems in pharmaceutical drug development.

title: Kaspar Rufibach
A second {M}arshall inequality in convex estimation
Computing Maximum Likelihood Estimators of a Log-Concave Density Function
